cyclone.name: SALLY
cyclone.current_location: about 160 miles south of Panama City, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest and expected to slow, then turn northwest toward the southeastern Louisiana–Mississippi coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southeastern Louisiana or the Mississippi coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from Indian Pass to Ochlockonee River, FL (Florida Panhandle)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning east of Ocean Springs, MS to Indian Pass, FL; Hurricane Warning Morgan City, LA to Ocean Springs, MS
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from southeastern Louisiana eastward to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible; probability of sustained tropical-storm-force winds <5%
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at PortMiami (surge confined to northern Gulf Coast)
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands may bring 1–2 inches of rain; no significant flooding expected
weather_observation.other_hazards: Occasional rip-currents along Florida east coast but major surf hazards focused on Gulf side
